00256     struct VehicleData {
00265         VehicleData(const std::string& id, SUMOReal vehLength, SUMOReal entryTimestep, SUMOReal leaveTimestep,
00266                     const std::string& typeID)
00267             : idM(id), lengthM(vehLength), entryTimeM(entryTimestep), leaveTimeM(leaveTimestep),
00268               speedM(lengthM / ((leaveTimeM - entryTimeM))), typeIDM(typeID) {}
00269

00282     };

00327     static inline SUMOReal speedSum(SUMOReal sumSoFar, const MSInductLoop::VehicleData& data) {
